roleset.name: Natural Disaster: debris flow, pyroclastic flow
roleset.note: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to mudflow, lahar.

example.text: I watched a Discovery Channel doc on Mt St Helens & the 300 mph pyroclastic flow.
... and the 60,000 tonne debris fow at Montrose in theDandenong Ranges of Victoria in 1891 (Moonand others 1992).
